languages.text: "В общем, умер Денз, то бишь Беллардо, мой старый друг и начальник. И оставил все свое состояние — немалое, хочу я сказать — этому Фиделио. Нехорошо это как-то с его стороны, не по-товарищески. То, что он своего бесполезного сынка обделил, весьма правильно, но старого друга?"

"Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"
languages.original_text: "В общем, умер Денз, то бишь Беллардо, мой старый друг и начальник. И оставил все свое состояние — немалое, хочу я сказать — этому Фиделио. Нехорошо это как-то с его стороны, не по-товарищески. То, что он своего бесполезного сынка обделил, весьма правильно, но старого друга?"

traits.locale_text: "Well, Denz, my old friend and boss, has died. And he's left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless junior high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

"Well, Denz, my old friend and boss, has died. And he's left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless junior high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

"Well, Denz, my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

"Well, Denz, my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

"Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

"Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

languages.text: “呃，丹兹……也就是贝拉多，我的老朋友，曾经的老板，死了。他把所有东西都留给了这个菲迪奥。我得提醒你一下，他有很多东西。他这么干可太不地道了，哪能这么对待朋友呢？他不想再管他那个没用的儿子，这我能理解，而且也算是件好事，可他的老朋友该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

traits.locale_text: “呃，丹兹……也就是贝拉多，我的老朋友，曾经的老板，死了。他把所有东西都留给了这个菲迪奥。我得提醒你一下，他有很多东西。他这么干可太不地道了，哪能这么对待朋友呢？他不想再管他那个没用的儿子，这我能理解，而且也算是件好事，可他的老朋友该怎么办？”

languages.text: «Bueno, Denz... es decir, Bellardo, mi viejo amigo y jefe, ha muerto. Y ha dejado todo lo que tenía (que era mucho, por cierto) a alguien llamado Fidelio. Y eso está muy feo, porque no es forma de tratar a tus amigos. Entiendo que dejara colgado al inútil de su hijo, y hasta me alegro, pero ¿a su viejo amigo?».
languages.original_text: "Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, Denz... es decir, Bellardo, mi viejo amigo y jefe, ha muerto. Y ha dejado todo lo que tenía (que era mucho, por cierto) a alguien llamado Fidelio. Y eso está muy feo, porque no es forma de tratar a tus amigos. Entiendo que dejara colgado al inútil de su hijo, y hasta me alegro, pero ¿a su viejo amigo?».

languages.text: 「デンツが…俺の旧友であり上司であるベラルドが死んだんだ。持っている財産をすべて残してね。そりゃあもう、かなりの量だぞ。彼はそれをフィデリオって奴に残したんだ。失礼な話だろう？大事な友人にすることじゃねえ。役立たずの息子を見捨てたのはわかるし、それはいいことだと思うが…俺は昔からの友達だぞ？」
languages.original_text: "Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

traits.locale_text: 「デンツが…俺の旧友であり上司であるベラルドが死んだんだ。持っている財産をすべて残してね。そりゃあもう、かなりの量だぞ。彼はそれをフィデリオって奴に残したんだ。失礼な話だろう？大事な友人にすることじゃねえ。役立たずの息子を見捨てたのはわかるし、それはいいことだと思うが…俺は昔からの友達だぞ？」

languages.text: "Nun, Denz – also Bellardo –, mein alter Freund und Boss, ist gestorben. Und seinen gesamten Besitz – und das ist echt viel – hat er diesem Fidelio hinterlassen. Das war unhöflich, so behandelt man seine Freunde nicht. Ich verstehe, dass er seinen nutzlosen Sohn nicht bedacht hat, und finde das auch richtig, aber seinen alten Freund?"
languages.original_text: "Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Denz – also Bellardo –, mein alter Freund und Boss, ist gestorben. Und seinen gesamten Besitz – und das ist echt viel – hat er diesem Fidelio hinterlassen. Das war unhöflich, so behandelt man seine Freunde nicht. Ich verstehe, dass er seinen nutzlosen Sohn nicht bedacht hat, und finde das auch richtig, aber seinen alten Freund?"

languages.text: « Denz... enfin, Bellardo, mon patron et mon vieil ami, est mort. Il a légué toutes ses possessions – et croyez-moi qu'il en avait beaucoup – à ce fameux Fidélio et je trouve ça franchement insultant. Qui ferait un coup pareil à ses amis ? Je peux comprendre qu'il laisse son incapable de fils sans le sou et j'approuve même sa décision, mais son plus vieil ami ? »
languages.original_text: "Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

traits.locale_text: « Denz... enfin, Bellardo, mon patron et mon vieil ami, est mort. Il a légué toutes ses possessions – et croyez-moi qu'il en avait beaucoup – à ce fameux Fidélio et je trouve ça franchement insultant. Qui ferait un coup pareil à ses amis ? Je peux comprendre qu'il laisse son incapable de fils sans le sou et j'approuve même sa décision, mais son plus vieil ami ? »

languages.text: "Eski dostum ve patronum Denz, yani Bellardo vefat etti. Malı mülkü çoktu, hepsini de şu Fidelio denen şahsa bıraktı. Kaba bir davranış. İnsan, dostlarına böyle yapmaz yani. İşe yaramaz oğlunu dımdızlak ortada bıraktı, iyi de yaptı ama ya eski can dostu?"
languages.original_text: "Well, Denz — that is, Bellardo — my old friend and boss, died. And he left all he had — and he had a lot, mind you — to this Fidelio. That was kind of rude of him, that's no way to treat your friends. I get it, he left his useless son high and dry, and a good thing too, but his old friend?"

traits.locale_text: "Denz, yani Bellardo, eski dostum ve patronum vefat etti. Bolca mal varlığı vardı ve hepsini bu Fidelio'ya bıraktı. Kaba bir davranıştı, insan dostlarına böyle davranmamalı. İşe yaramaz oğlunu dımdızlak ortada bıraktı, iyi de yaptı ama eski dostuna da mı böyle yapacaktı?"
